reviewText: This item  is a little outdated but the sewing techniques are very useable and the tutorials are clear and instructive. I enjoy Nancy and her sewing programs and books, but I feel she would have done better to let her co-host speak a little more instead of cutting her off in the conversation. I am happy to have the cd, but there was no booklet included with the patterns, as it states in the cd.
I love this video because it has tons of fantastic information, as well as creative ideas for completing the restyling of a plain ole sweatshirt!  Lots of ideas, lots of info.  Great product

I really enjoyed this item. I am really big into comfort clothes so with an eye towards
Nancys' actual wardrobe, I have enjoyed this book of how to.
I trusted Nancy's products and was very glad to be able to get the dvd to try my hand at some makeovers.
